results.content: Very easily to follow along with. This instructor had not only the resources(up to date), but did not skip any steps, assuming every corner should be covered, while staying on task highlighting the KEY aspects of the subject.

results.content: Porbably the order of the last HTTP video could be at the beginning of the Section 3, and leaving the practice (API and Postman) at the end, and maybe adding a conclusion or wrap up video (or future guidelines), but overall great course!

results.content:
A fairly clear and well explained introductory course. Goes straight to the concepts, without getting lost in superfluous details. Highly recommended.

The teacher's diction is perfect. Even if you do not have a very high level of English it is very easy to follow
